ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control
ModMetaData.author: VouLT
ModMetaData.description:
Bulk assignment of colonists and animals to outfits, areas, drugs, food, work in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.
Features: - Policies presets for Work, Schedule, Assign and Animal tabs (and WeaponsTab) - Default outfits, food, drugs when colonist, prisoners or slaves join your colony - Emergency' button to toggle your configured policies at once in one click or keyboard shorcut
v2.7.8 - Fixed emergency button not working for Mechs if Ideology was disabled v2.7.7 - Fixed a crash in BPC settings window if WeaponsTabReborn mod was not fully initialized; v2.7.6 - Fixed translations; Added Copy/Paste MechTab and to WeaponsTab; Fixed minor bugs; v2.7.5 - Updated translations; Fixed AssignTab policies Copy-Paste bug v2.7.4 - Added Medical UI + Compatibility with Misc. Robots + Improved integration with Achtung! Rescue job
Mod Integrations List: - Fluffly's Work Tab (full integration!) - Fluffly's Animal Tab - Numbers - Combat Extended - Assign Animal Food - Children, school and learning - WeaponsTabReborn - Misc. Robots
